mapper.insert: insert into pet_mytown(mno, gno, title, cont, cmtcnt, view) values(#{writer.no}, #{smallAddress.no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{commentCount}, #{viewCount})
mapper.select: select t.tno, t.title, t.date, t.view, m.mno, m.nick, c.cno, c.cname, s.gno, s.gname from pet_city c inner join pet_state s on c.cno=s.cno inner join pet_mytown t on s.gno=t.gno inner join pet_user m on t.mno=m.mno where c.cname=#{cname} and s.gname=#{gname} order by t.tno desc

select t.tno, t.title, t.date, t.view, m.mno, m.nick, c.cno, c.cname, s.gno, s.gname from pet_city c inner join pet_state s on c.cno=s.cno inner join pet_mytown t on s.gno=t.gno inner join pet_user m on t.mno=m.mno
where t.title like concat('%', #{value},'%') or m.nick like concat('%', #{value},'%') or t.cont like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by b.no desc

select t.tno, t.title, t.date, t.view, m.mno, m.nick, c.cno, c.cname, s.gno, s.gname from pet_city c inner join pet_state s on c.cno=s.cno inner join pet_mytown t on s.gno=t.gno inner join pet_user m on t.mno=m.mno
where t.tno=#{value}
mapper.update: update pet_mytown set title = #{title}, cont = #{cont}, date = now() where tno=#{tno}
